home.title: Welcome to TrueUnion - Find Your Perfect Match
home.hero_subtitle: Join a community of thousands looking for a meaningful connection. Safe, secure, and verified profiles to help you find your soulmate.
home.profile_1_bio: I love hiking and exploring new cafes. Looking for someone with a good sense of humor.
home.profile_2_bio: Passionate about my work and enjoy unwinding with a good book or movie.
home.profile_3_bio: Creative soul who enjoys art, music, and meaningful conversations.
home.profile_4_bio: Ambitious and family-oriented. I enjoy traveling and trying new cuisines.
home.step_1_desc: Sign up and build your detailed profile to let others know who you are.
home.step_2_desc: Use our advanced search to find profiles and connect with members.
home.step_3_desc: Begin conversations and take the first step towards your new life together.
home.story_1_text: We found each other thanks to TrueUnion! The platform made it so easy to connect with someone who shared my values. We're getting married next year!
home.story_2_text: I was skeptical about online matrimony, but I'm so glad I gave this site a try. I met my wonderful husband here, and we couldn't be happier.
